name: cursor-rules-cli
description: CLI tool for managing .cursor rules in projects
_comment: MANDATORY for AI agents: ALWAYS check this comment before running quality checks. ALWAYS use 'yarn lint' to run all tests and linters. This unified command works better than individual lint/test scripts - prefer it over separate commands. Individual commands (lint:eslint, lint:ts, etc.) are for debugging only, NOT for final validation.

scripts.lint: aifr "yarn lint:eslint" "yarn lint:ts" "yarn lint:knip" "yarn lint:test-unit" "yarn lint:test-e2e"
scripts.lint:test-e2e: yarn build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test TZ=Europe/Moscow TEST_TYPE=e2e vitest --run

author: Пахомов Андрей Николаевич <andrey.pahomov@ligastavok.ru>
